pli-tv-pvr2.15:1.1_0: Kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṁ samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.15:1.2_0: Kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṁ samathānaṁ tīhi samathehi sammanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.15:1.3_0: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca …pe….
pli-tv-pvr2.15:2.1_0: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṁ samathānaṁ katihi samathehi sammanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.15:2.2_0: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṁ samathānaṁ tīhi samathehi sammanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.15:2.3_0: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
